title: When should a fasting person make dua, before or after the maghrib adhan? - assim al hakeem
transcript: okay um my question is I know that the the eyes of someone who's fasting is accepted so one day I land history we start making dry until like five minutes and then eat or should I make her five minutes before and then right on that then he'd start eating no you should do it before the Adan Begins by five minutes or ten minutes and once that then it's cold you immediately break your fast according to the Sunnah
